applicant-name.name: WENZHOU RESEARCH INSTITUTE OF ZHEJIANG UNIV

invention-title: Nickel-based bimetallic catalyst and preparation method thereof
一种镍基双金属催化剂及其制备方法

abstract.p: The invention discloses a nickel-based bimetallic catalyst and a preparation method thereof, and belongs to the technical field of catalysis, according to the technology, a bimetallic strong oxide is adopted as a carrier, a nickel-based bimetallic active component is loaded on the surface of the bimetallic strong oxide, and methane preparation through carbon dioxide hydrogenation driven by plasma under mild conditions is realized. The preparation process of the catalyst comprises the following steps: firstly, preparing a layered double-metal hydroxide carrier by adopting a coprecipitation method, taking magnesium nitrate and aluminum nitrate as raw materials, and taking a mixed solution of sodium hydroxide and sodium carbonate as a precipitator; and then, loading a nickel-based bimetallic active component by adopting a wet impregnation method, preparing a mixed solution of nickel salt, ferric salt and urea with a certain concentration, impregnating the mixed solution on the layered bimetallic hydroxide carrier, and carrying out heating reflux, water washing, centrifugation, drying, roasting, grinding, screening and high-temperature hydrogen reduction to obtain the nickel-based bimetallic catalyst. The catalyst has high-dispersion nickel-iron alloy active sites, good carbon dioxide adsorption capacity and rich surface oxygen vacancies, shows relatively high reaction activity under a low-temperature plasma condition, and can be used for strengthening the low-temperature plasma driven carbon dioxide methanation process and improving the carbon dioxide conversion rate and the methane yield.

本发明公开了一种镍基双金属催化剂及其制备方法，属于催化技术领域，该技术采用双金属强氧化物作为载体，并在其表面负载镍基双金属活性组分，实现温和条件下等离子体驱动二氧化碳加氢制甲烷。催化剂的制备流程包括：首先，采用共沉淀法制备层状双金属氢氧化物载体，以硝酸镁和硝酸铝为原料，氢氧化钠和碳酸钠的混合溶液为沉淀剂；随后，采用湿法浸渍法负载镍基双金属活性组分，配置一定浓度的镍盐、铁盐和尿素的混合溶液，浸渍在层状双金属氢氧化物载体上，经加热回流、水洗、离心、干燥、焙烧、研磨、筛分和高温氢气还原制得镍基双金属催化剂。该催化剂具有高分散的镍铁合金活性位点、良好的二氧化碳吸附能力、以及丰富的表面氧空位，在低温等离子体条件下表现出较高的反应活性，可用于强化低温等离子体驱动二氧化碳甲烷化过程，提高二氧化碳转化率和甲烷收率。
